Metadata.title: Kermit Wall Panel Showcase
Metadata.description: High-quality SPC Wall Panels for modern interiors.

HomePage.heroSubtitle: Discover premium SPC products that redefine your space with elegance and durability.
HomePage.spcWallPanelsDescription: Explore our premium collection of Stone Polymer Composite wall panels.
HomePage.spcFlooringDescription: Durable and stylish flooring solutions for any space.
HomePage.spc3dWallPanelsDescription: Add depth and texture with our innovative 3D wall panels.

InquiryForm.title: Send an Inquiry

InquiryForm.messagePlaceholder: I'd like to know more about pricing and availability...
InquiryForm.successDescription: Thank you, {name}! Your inquiry about {panelName} has been received.
InquiryForm.errorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
